main event: A ground visual observation of a silver dollar sized object that broke up into parts before burning up was reported on May 7, 1961.
interesting points: The object was initially observed as circular in shape and broke into 2-6 smaller parts,The entire observation lasted between 10 to 15 seconds,The object was described as having a faint white trail,The incident is characteristic of a bolide, which explodes shortly before burning up,Witnesses included personnel from the Aviano Air Base in Italy.
sighted object: a silver dollar sized object that broke up and burned up
witness description: personnel from the Aviano Air Base
